languages.text: "Что толку в том совете, коли опять слово возьмет железный жрец, не ведающий радости битвы и усекший себе члены, дабы заменить их угодными своему богу аугментами? Сейчас он вновь предложит трусливый и недостойный воинов план, что в чести среди его братства..."

"What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"
languages.original_text: "Что толку в том совете, коли опять слово возьмет железный жрец, не ведающий радости битвы и усекший себе члены, дабы заменить их угодными своему богу аугментами? Сейчас он вновь предложит трусливый и недостойный воинов план, что в чести среди его братства..."

traits.locale_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not of the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not of the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “那个完全不懂何为战斗乐趣的齿轮神甫，为了取悦他们全知全能的主人，割掉了自己的器官，换上了植入物。就算再和他举行一场战争会议，又能有什么用呢？他只会和他的弟兄们一样，提出那些让战士蒙羞的懦弱计划——”
languages.original_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"

traits.locale_text: “那个完全不懂何为战斗乐趣的齿轮祭司，为了取悦他们全知全能的主人，割掉了自己的器官，换上了植入物。就算再和他举行一场战争会议，又能有什么用呢？他只会和他的弟兄们一样，提出那些让战士蒙羞的懦弱计划——”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « À quoi bon nous lancer dans un énième conseil de guerre avec un technoprêtre insensible aux joies du combat et qui s'est arraché des parties du corps pour les remplacer par des augmentations dans le simple but de faire plaisir à son maître omniscient ? Comme tous ses frères, il va encore nous proposer un plan veule, indigne des vrais guerriers... »
languages.original_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"

traits.locale_text: « À quoi bon nous lancer dans un énième conseil de guerre avec un technoprêtre insensible aux joies du combat et qui s'est arraché des parties du corps pour les remplacer par des augmentations dans le simple but de faire plaisir à son maître omniscient ? Comme tous ses frères, il va encore nous proposer un plan veule, indigne des vrais guerriers... »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「戦いの楽しさを知らず、全知の主を喜ばせるために自分の部位を切り取ってオーグメントに取り替えるような歯車の司祭と軍事会議などを開いてなんの役に立つ？また同胞たちの慣例に従って、戦士にふさわしくない臆病な計画を提案するだだけだ――」
languages.original_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"

traits.locale_text: 「戦いの楽しさを知らず、全知の主を喜ばせるために自分の部位を切り取ってオーグメントに取り替えるような歯車の司祭と軍事会議などを開いてなんの役に立つ？また同胞たちの慣例に従って、戦士にふさわしくない臆病な計画を提案するだだけだ――」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «¿De qué sirve un consejo de guerra con un engranasacerdote que no conoce el fervor de la batalla, se cortó las piezas y se puso aumentos con tal de complacer a su omnisciente maestro? Volverá a proponer un plan impropio de guerreros de verdad, como acostumbran los suyos...».
languages.original_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"

traits.locale_text: «¿De qué sirve un consejo de guerra con un engranasacerdote que no conoce el fervor de la batalla, se cortó las piezas y se puso aumentos con tal de complacer a su omnisciente maestro? Volverá a proponer un plan impropio de guerreros de verdad, como acostumbran los suyos...».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Was hilft ein weiterer Kriegsrat mit einem Zahnradpriester, der nichts von der Freude der Schlacht versteht, der seine Teile abgeschnitten und sie mit Augmentationen ersetzt hat, um seinen allwissenden Meister zu erfreuen? Er wird einen feigen Plan vorschlagen, der Kriegern unwürdig ist, wie seine Brüder es immer tu-"
languages.original_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"

traits.locale_text: "Was hilft ein weiterer Kriegsrat mit einem Zahnradpriester, der nichts von der Freude der Schlacht versteht, der seine Teile abgeschnitten und sie mit Augmentationen ersetzt hat, um seinen allwissenden Meister zu erfreuen? Er wird einen feigen Plan vorschlagen, der Kriegern unwürdig ist, wie seine Brüder es immer tu-"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Uzuvlarını kesip her şeye kadir efendisini memnun etmek için ogmentler kuşanan, savaşın zevkine nail olamamış dişli rahibin bulunduğu yeni bir savaş konseyinden ne hayır gelir ki? Kendi kardeşlerine yaraşan ancak savaşçılara layık olmayan korkakça bir plan önerisi sun..."
languages.original_text: "What good is another war council with a cog-priest who knows not the joys of battle, who cut off his parts and replaced them with augments to please his all-knowing master? He will propose again a cowardly plan unworthy of warriors as is the custom of his brethren—"
